Positioning.Primary: Intelligence layer for teamwork — living inside chat.
Positioning.TrojanHorse: Multiplayer team chat for AI‑native teams.

NorthStar.Statement: Reduce collaboration friction by surfacing signal (assumptions, drift, bias, power asymmetry) and preserving team memory.

Phase.Objective: Launch a blazing‑fast, multiplayer‑first chat that quietly lays the data & ontology groundwork for the intelligence layer.

MustHave.Item: Channels, threads, mentions, reactions, file drops
Fast composer with slash actions (summarize, format, extract tasks)
ThreadMemory v0 — persistent, structured message store
InsightTracker v0 — internal store for flagged moments (goals, roles, tone)
AgendaGoalMapping v0 — link threads to goals/initiatives
RecallEngine v0 — instant search across past threads
Identity & Auth (orgs, workspaces, members, roles)
Privacy & Controls (admin toggles, redaction, retention)
Foundational Telemetry (latency, usage, stability)

NiceToHave.Item: Lightweight integrations: Google Drive/Docs, GitHub PR links, Linear issue unfurls
Basic AI Helpers: TL;DR, action items, “highlight decision”

Architecture.Client: Web App (React/Next.js), multiplayer-first UI, optimistic updates

Service.name: InsightStore
Service.concerns: signals, events, metrics keyed to ontology

ComplianceSecurity.Item: Data encryption in transit & at rest

KPI.name: Avg daily messages per active member
Insight capture coverage (threads with goals linked)

PricingAccess.Model: Free core chat; Pro for recall & admin controls; Design partner program with lifetime discount.

Risk.Mitigation: Use copy and UI to signal “built for AI era”; seed Decision Highlights + Recall moments.
Make goal/agenda linking effortless (inline chips, shortcuts); backfill via AI extraction.

Phase.Objective: Activate the reasoning layer that sees beyond text: detect drift/bias/power asymmetry; speak up at the right moment; make decisions & context instantly recallable. Introduce Reasoning Level Navigator to guide conversations toward the optimal reasoning “mode” for their context, avoiding rigid progression and enabling adaptive, context-aware collaboration.

MustHave.Item: DecisionRecall v1 — who/what/why, traceable back to sources
DriftDetection v1 — deviation from stated goal/agenda
AssumptionScanner v1 — hidden premises & groupthink cues
MissingVoices v1 — inclusion nudges based on roles & context
SentimentTension v1 — friction meter + escalation alerts
InterventionFramework v1 — timing, tone, channel, confidence thresholds
Org Memory Graph — durable, queryable knowledge across channels
ReasoningLevelDetector v1 — classifies messages/threads into 6 reasoning levels (Observation → Self-Propagating Systems)
ConversationTypeClassifier v1 — detects conversation type via agenda/goals, keywords, and historical patterns
LevelRangeMapping v1 — maps conversation type to optimal reasoning level range
AdaptiveNudgeEngine v1 — suggests moving up, down, or staying based on range, time-in-level, and confidence
NudgeToneAdapter — adjusts language to org culture and urgency
Level Flow Visualization — timeline of reasoning progression stored in OrgMemoryGraph

NiceToHave.Item: Role-aware agents (PM, Scribe, Critic) with guardrails
Multi-modal grounding (docs, PRs, tickets) in recalls
Historical Pattern Learning for optimal ranges
Level Jump Recommendations when skipping intermediate levels is optimal

Component.name: SignalExtractors
Component.outputs: typed signals (assumptions, drift, silence, reasoningLevel, conversationType)

SafetyControls.Item: Red-team tests for bias & false positives

Milestone.title: Adaptive nudges live in closed pilot

Monetization.Plan: Intelligence add‑on per seat; volume discounts; security/compliance tier (audit trails, SSO, DLP).

Risk.Mitigation: Strict InterventionFramework with confidence gating, role routing, undo/feedback loops.
Transparent logs, per‑workspace policies, admin guardrails, regional data residency roadmap.

DesignPartners.Who: High‑agency, AI‑forward teams (5–50 seats), PM/Design/Eng heavy.
DesignPartners.Offer: Early access, pricing lock, roadmap influence, private support channel.
DesignPartners.Cadence: Bi‑weekly sessions; structured feedback; case studies.

GTM.Narrative: “New intelligence needs new standards.” Chat as the on‑ramp; reasoning as the destination.

Artifacts.Item: Founder demo loop + short reels of ‘magic recall’ moments
Landing page with crisp claims + live product clips

MetricsReview.Dashboards: Retention, latency, recall usage, intervention outcomes, trust votes

HiringSignals.Now: Founding Frontend, Founding Backend, Product Designer (systems+motion)

NudgeDecision.reason: Stuck in Level 2 for 22 min — Strategic Planning aims for Levels 3–5.

DataCapture.Item: Reasoning feature tags in InsightTracker v0

InternalTooling.Item: Minimal labeling UI for level/type corrections

MoatBuilding.Item: Pattern library of successful reasoning flows

Glossary.Term: Invisible drag from drift, bias, and lost context.
Context-aware AI message (or silent nudge) with rationale & confidence.
Linked decisions, goals, people, and artifacts for recall & reasoning.
